entry.title: Libraries Are the New Front Line in America's Mental-Health Crisis
entry.content: Librarians are reversing overdoses in bathrooms and defending against people brandishing guns.

entry.title: Israel Steps Up Gaza Bombing as Biden Urges It to Protect Civilians
entry.content: Israel struck more than 300 targets in the enclave over the past day, as President Biden and other Western leaders expressed support for Israel while urging it to protect civilians.

entry.title: Palestinians Are Refusing to Flee Israeli Bombing in Gaza. 'If I Die, I Die.'
entry.content: Many families wonâ€™t leave their homes in the north, fearing a repeat of the mass displacement 75 years ago.
